Great Torrent. I will be uploading a Verdi torrent here soon too. My plan is to upload 20 or so of his operas, some with multiple casts and orchestras. This is a great starting point. Price's Aida is "priceless" (no pun intended).

Tackar! I very much hope his Quattro Pezzi Sacri are included. Got it on a scratchy lp and would love to have it on CD. If anyone has the version with Eric Ericson/Riccardo Muti as directors UPLOAD!
Guys, just so you know.  Most of this is 72kbps and 96kbps.  It sounds okay for such a low bitrate, but I wish I had known this before I started downloading.  Just a heads up.
thank you very much for this upload!  I really wish there were more torrents of classical music.  this is a fantastic start.
